content.rendered:
Dental Bridge

Dental Bridge Gardena, CA

Our dentists may advise a dental bridge to fill the gap in your smile if you are missing one tooth or several teeth in a row. An affordable solution for restoring missing teeth is a dental bridge, which can help strengthen your bite. You can smile again with confidence with a dental bridge that looks very natural!

Why Do You Need a Dental Bridge?

Dental bridges are an efficient tooth replacement solution that helps you maintain good oral health. Dental bridges help you by:

  • Restoring your ability to speak and eat normally
  • Alleviating excessive bite stress
  • Improving the shape of your face
  • Replacing less desirable removable partial dentures
  • Preventing your remaining natural teeth from shifting
  • Improving your smile

How Does a Dental Bridge Work?

Bridges are a fixed dental restoration and cannot be removed. Two dental crowns that are manufactured specifically for your smile serve as the anchors for the dental bridge. They are securely affixed to the teeth or dental implants next to the gap left by the missing tooth. The dental bridge is usually finished in just two visits to our office and lasts for many years.

Book Your Appointment Now
